definition[0]: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers
example[0]: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
example[1]: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
example[2]: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
example[3]: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
example[4]: People have no faith in new technology.
example[5]: The boat is equipped with the latest technology.
example[6]: The labs use advanced technology to study the function of various cells.
example[7]: the rapid development of computer technology in the 1950s and 1960s
example[8]: Digital technology is bringing the media and communications sectors together.
example[9]: The advance of medical technology has meant that more patients survive.
example[10]: Military technology makes huge advances during wartime.
example[11]: Because of developments in technology, minicomputers can now do what mainframes did in the past.
definition[1]: knowledge dealing with scientific or industrial methods and the use of these methods in industry, farming etc
example[12]: What impact is the new technology having on people at work?
example[13]: The system uses advanced digital and satellite technologies.
definition[2]: machinery and equipment used or developed as a result of scientific and technical knowledge
example[14]: We manufacture our products using the very latest technology.
